metadata.title: CVE-2014-9556 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the qtmd_decompress function in libmspack 0.4 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang) via a crafted CABfile, which triggers an infinite loop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9556` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cabextract - 1.6-1.1
No subscription required

libmspack0 - 0.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cabextract package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6-1.1').
libmspack package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4-3').
